name: Tamaghost Jump!
description:
Snooze your alarm to delay waking up from your nice dream...But the more you snooze, the more you risk your dream turning into a nightmare...

Entry for Ludum Dare 50 Game Jam. The theme was "Delay the Inevitable".

An experimental little platformer we did in 3 days for fun. Nothing too fancy :) Playable in 10 minutes.

Ludum Dare Notes:

Please note that this game was developed in 3 days for the Ludum Dare 50.

All art seen in the game was designed and drawn in those 3 days.

All code pertaining the Tamaghost Jump game was coded in those 3 days, however it is built on top of our existing framework which provides minor things like the text boxes seen at the end of the game.


DISCLAIMER: This has no relation to Project Kat or Paper Lily Chapter 1. Chapter 1 is coming soon! Thank you for your patience!

OTHER DISCLAIMER: This game may be spooky. Beware. 

FINAL DISCLAIMER: Game jams are hard, so please expect it to be a buggy disaster with half-assed art. Thank you.

Controls:

Arrow keys - Move
Spacebar - Jump/Double Jump
